page.title: 03GOLDSITHNEY
page.content: GOLDSITHNEY LIES APROX. ONE MILE TO THE EAST OF MARAZION. IT IS AN EXPANDING COMMUNITY AND HAS BEEN DESIGNATED AS A CONSERVATION AREA. IT IS PURELY RESIDENTIAL AS THERE IS NO LOCAL INDUSTRY APART FROM AGRICULTURE, MOST OF THE EMPLOYED RESIDENTS COMMUTING TO PENZANCE. THERE IS A HEALTHY COMMUNIAL SOCIAL LIFE, MOSTLY CENTERED ON THE VILLAGE HALLS WHERE THE YOUNG AND OLD ARE CATERED FOR AS WELL AS THE MORE ATHLETICALLY MINDED. THE CHRISTMAS TREE CLUB RAISES MONEY THROUGHOUT THE YEAR TO BE USED AT XMAS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PEOPLE OF GOLDSITHNEY. MOST OF THE HOUSING IS PRIVATE BUT THERE ARE TWO SMALL COUNCIL ESTATES AND A FEW OLD PEOPLES HOMES.
